blog.name: lady-of-the-spirit
blog.title: the nicest bitch you'll ever meet.
blog.description:
She/Her. Canadian/American who obsesses over several things. Currently trying to figure out my sexuality, but I'm pretty sure I'm not heterosexual. Working on being an author of something other than fanfiction. Sometimes reblogs stuff from fandoms I'm not in because I think they're pretty. Will fight you if you call Tony Stark a villain.
Generally I don't actually add to posts I reblog and so I leave my opinions in the tags so maybe read those.

tags: i love characters who stay kind despite everything but i also love people who give back what they've been given
summary: I need more characters who everyone assumes the worst of, for whatever reason, and responds to their judgement not by being kind...
body: I need more characters who everyone assumes the worst of, for whatever reason, and responds to their judgement not by being kind despite it all, but by being unapologetically an asshole because fuck the world, if they expect the worst I’ll show them the worst I can be.

reblog.comment: I need more characters who everyone assumes the worst of, for whatever reason, and responds to their judgement not by being kind despite it all, but by being unapologetically an asshole because fuck the world, if they expect the worst I’ll show them the worst I can be.

trail.content_raw: I need more characters who everyone assumes the worst of, for whatever reason, and responds to their judgement not by being kind despite it all, but by being unapologetically an asshole because fuck the world, if they expect the worst I’ll show them the worst I can be.
trail.content: I need more characters who everyone assumes the worst of, for whatever reason, and responds to their judgement not by being kind despite it all, but by being unapologetically an asshole because fuck the world, if they expect the worst I’ll show them the worst I can be.

summary: Shwarma and Pride
body:
Shwarma and Pride

I’ve waited for 7 years to try shwarma, ever since May 4, 2012, when Tony Stark first mentioned it. I was finally able to try some at my first PRIDE, so that made my day after getting separated from my friends again…. I wanted bubble tea give me a break it was delicious and 10/10 good would recommend again

tags: time to hurt Stephen this time around
I have a good plot fic in mind for him
summary: How broken is Stephen going to be when he broke his oath to do no harm for the second time? Staring at the lake remembering how...
body:
How broken is Stephen going to be when he broke his oath to do no harm for the second time? Staring at the lake remembering how helpless he was when he couldn’t save his sister. Now history repeats itself when he couldn’t save Tony as he stares at the arc reactor floating away. He may have saved countless lives but at the expense of his morals, facilitated the death of a good man, and left a broken little family trying to pick up the pieces. 

No mirrors are seen the in sanctum. Stephen doesn’t want to see his reflection, too afraid to see his face, the face of a liar and murderer.

blog.name: whatismarvel
blog.title: Carina⚡️
blog.description: I mainly write for characters in the mcu. Requests are currently open! xreader only :)

summary: I love you • (tony stark x reader)
body:
I love you • (tony stark x reader)

summary; you’re hurt.

warnings; it’s a blurb, very angsty. I was clearing out my drafts when I saw this. Never got around to actually writing it but here’s the rough draft :) also I’m finishing up a few requests so be on the lookout! enjoy loves!

______

“I love you, Y/N.”

The words slip out of his mouth as you watch his hologram stand up.

“You’ve changed me, in a good way. You know what- you’ve changed me in the best way possible.” He says as he fidgets around on the chair he’s on, he keeps looking at the ground and you know he knew this was going to happen. He knew he was going to die. He knew he was going to leave you here, sobbing over him. There’s no point of fighting back your tears. You’re hurt. You’re in pain. You’ve lost the love of your life and there’s nothing you can do to bring him back, to bring your best friend back, the only person who gave you a reason to wake up each morning with a smile, the only person that gave you a sense of direction in the world, the only person that made you happy, is gone. You’re shaking, you can’t believe this is happening. You’re shouting, screaming, yelling at everyone and everything. Your vision is blurry and all you can hear is Tony’s words echoing as your eyes slowly close.

“I love you.”

reblog.comment:
I love you • (tony stark x reader)

You’ve lost the love of your life and there’s nothing you can do to bring him back, to bring your best friend back, the only person who gave you a reason to wake up each morning with a smile, the only person that gave you a sense of direction in the world, the only person that made you happy, is gone. You’re shaking, you can’t believe this is happening. You’re shouting, screaming, yelling at everyone and everything. Your vision is blurry and all you can hear is Tony’s words echoing as your eyes slowly close.

“I love you.”
trail.content:
I love you • (tony stark x reader)

summary; you’re hurt.

warnings; it’s a blurb, very angsty. I was clearing out my drafts when I saw this. Never got around to actually writing it but here’s the rough draft :) also I’m finishing up a few requests so be on the lookout! enjoy loves!

______

“I love you, Y/N.”

The words slip out of his mouth as you watch his hologram stand up.

“You’ve changed me, in a good way. You know what- you’ve changed me in the best way possible.” He says as he fidgets around on the chair he’s on, he keeps looking at the ground and you know he knew this was going to happen. He knew he was going to die. He knew he was going to leave you here, sobbing over him. There’s no point of fighting back your tears. You’re hurt. You’re in pain. You’ve lost the love of your life and there’s nothing you can do to bring him back, to bring your best friend back, the only person who gave you a reason to wake up each morning with a smile, the only person that gave you a sense of direction in the world, the only person that made you happy, is gone. You’re shaking, you can’t believe this is happening. You’re shouting, screaming, yelling at everyone and everything. Your vision is blurry and all you can hear is Tony’s words echoing as your eyes slowly close.

“I love you.”

summary: Sometimes when I watch Iron Man 3 and see all the armors show up at the same time at the end, I think about the fact that a few...
body:
Sometimes when I watch Iron Man 3 and see all the armors show up at the same time at the end, I think about the fact that a few of them are designed specifically to be super fast (at least one can go supersonic safely)

So were they all just going the same speed regardless for the Drama™

Or were the slow ones just desperately trying to keep up

blog.name: drabblesinthemoonlight
blog.title: Dancing In The Moonlight
blog.description: Out of order Winteriron and Ironwidow drabbles. An amateur female!Toni enthusiast and writer.

summary:
“Tasha, Tasha, Natashalie, Itsy Bitsy.” 
A hushed but excited whisper in her ear.
Natasha groaned into her pillow. 
“No.” 
“Hey...
body:
“Tasha, Tasha, Natashalie, Itsy Bitsy.”


A hushed but excited whisper in her ear.

Natasha groaned into her pillow.


“No.”


“Hey c’mon, I got an Idea, babe, you gotta listen, all my ideas are golden.” Tony prodded Natasha in the back with a finger.


“It’s three, your ideas are garbage at three,” Natasha grumped into her pillow.


“Shut up, the pancake tosser was glorious for as long as it lasted.”


“It was a little monster.”


Tony retaliated by blowing a raspberry on Natasha’s bareback.


“We have to go to Pride this year.”


“Resounding, earth shattering–”


“No, no, listen Tasha.”


“We go every year.”


“Yeah, yeah, but, like, y’know how Peter goes but the police don’t?”


“Yeah, he goes as Spider-man to provi– oh.”


“Yeah, ‘oh’, I’m refitting your gear, say goodbye to black on black until July.”


All thoughts of sleep temporarily vanished, Natasha whirled around, tackling Tony down playfully. She went down with an ‘oomph’ on the memory foam.


“Black on black defines me.”


“And it does, you look terrifying darling, just not for July, baby, honey, sweetheart, snookums, please,” Tony begged between peals of giggling.


“You’re laughing at me.”


“You made me you scheming spy!”


Natasha cracked a grin, squeezing her girlfriend’s wrists affectionately before letting go.

Then blew a raspberry on Tony’s unguarded throat.

“St-a-ahp it you fucker!” Tony giggled, pawing uselessly at Natasha’s shoulders.
